permissions: Allowed for admins. Non-admins can create only when a material supplier is set and they are a manager member of that material supplier or a member of its broker.
side_effects: Creates a material type record. For generic types, may refresh cached generic material type names after commit.
validation_notes: name is required and cannot include restricted characters : or tabs/newlines. name and fully qualified name must be unique (generic types unique without a material supplier; supplier-specific unique per supplier). start-site-type must be JobSite or MaterialSite when provided. lbs-per-cubic-foot must be greater than 0 when provided. aggregate-gradation and aggregate-ecce must be between 0 and 100 when provided. If parent-material-type belongs to a material supplier, material-supplier must be set and match. If material-supplier is set, parent-material-type is required unless the server override flag is used.

flags.name: --lbs-per-cubic-foot
flags.validation: Must be a number greater than 0.

flags.name: --name
flags.validation: Required; must not include : or tabs/newlines.

flags.name: --start-site-type
flags.validation: Must be JobSite or MaterialSite when provided.
